fixes.name: mod US MM
fixes.dax_expression: IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "SFB", 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * -1, 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM])
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level IF that negates the Ut. US MM value when R/RR equals "SFB". Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF and replaced column references with 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. This is a calculated column because it operates at the row level without aggregation.
